title: bring back random champion button to champion selection screen,please!!!
body: i kinda tired of choosing my champion and i thought you could bring back the random champion button to the champion selection screen.Many thanks.

replies.body:
When it comes to modes like Summoners Rift or 3v3, players typically value having a strategic reason behind their comp. That said, we can agree with wanting to spice things up a bit with a random selection; that's what ARAM is for! If you want it specifically for Draft though, you might need to wait for another rotating game mode where your Champion is chosen for you, like Nemesis Draft.

You could suggest a feature similar to your idea in the [**gameplay channel**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance) though to discuss with others. Maybe something like a random button for a select pool of Champions depending on your role in Normal games? That could be cool! :)
